attributes.title: 2021 Toyota Corolla 2.0 XR

attributes.description:
Conquer the journey in the all-new, all-conquering, Haval Jolion. It offers a clean, contemporary design Influenced by bold architecture and mastered by modern engineering, the Jolion is a vehicle that embodies intelligent thinking. The Jolion features a powerful yet eco-friendly 1.5 Turbo engine producing 105kw @ 210Nm and a measured 7,5L/100km giving you the best of both worlds.
Highly spec features include:
-	Speed sensitive Electric Power Steering
-	Adjustable steering
-	Electronic Parking Brake
-	Cruise Control
-	17 Inch Alloy Wheels
-	3.5-inch colour instrument cluster
-	Front 12V power outlet
-	Fabric seats
-	Driver seat Manual adjust: 6 directions
-	60:40 split folding rear seats
-	Dual and front Side airbags
-	Child lock
-	ABS + EBD (Electronic Brakeforce Distribution) + BA (Brake Assist)
-	Electronic Stability System (ESC) + Traction Control (TCS)
-	Anti-Roll System (RMI) + Secondary Collision Mitigation (SCM)
-	Hill Assist
-	Tyre pressure monitoring system (TPMS)
-	Rear park distance sensors
-	Driving fatigue detection
-	Keyless entry and Push button start
-	Bluetooth Handsfree and Front, rear dual USB connector
-	10.25-inch multimedia touch display
-	4-speaker system
-	Speed Sensitive Volume Control
-	Electric height-adjusting headlights and follow me home function
-	Daytime running lamps
-	Manual Aircon
-	Standard with 5yr/100 000Km Warranty and 5yr/60 000Km Service Plan
attributes.title: 2022 Haval Jolion 1.5T City

attributes.description:
It's an incredibly engaging drive even cruising around town, with nicely weighted (if distant) steering, great body stiffness and wonderful pedal response. The vehicle is a 2014 Audi S6 Quattro, luxury, sporty looks and comfort are all combined together in this vehicle. Its regal image, exquisite interior, powerful engine. The vehicle comes with power steering, multi-functioning steering wheel, trim leather seats, park assistance package, memory seats, electric windows, 360 camera degree, central locking remote, speed cruise control, climate control, air conditioning, bang and olufsen sound system and Qauttro ( 4 wheel drive). Your loyalty and support as our current and future client are highly appreciated. Thank you for choosing Crescent Car Sales. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love. We guarantee 100% satisfaction on all products and services from us. Our price excludes additional costs such as license and registration, COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
#9880

Book your test drive today!
